Service Details: Provides individual and group counselling services adults experiencing relationship conflicts, difficulty balancing the demands of family life, struggles with life transitions or losses
How to Apply: - Call Interior Health Adult Mental Health Services at 250.868.7788 for a referral to an appropriate community resource- The Kelowna Family Centre offers up to six, 1-hour sessions for free with a referral from Adult Mental Health- Fee for Service sessions are also offered; please call for details
Address & Map: 347 Leon Ave, #204Kelowna, BC     V1Y 8C7View MapQuest Map
